Constant updates and fine tuning to every weapon and other aspects of this game, makes Counter Strike a great f.p.s. platform for a community to flourish and explore the depths of this gaming masterpiece. Highly recommended for players who like predominately skill and intelligent shooters with an easy to pick up and play but very hard to master core foundation.
